file_content.text: Mine! Mine! This race is mine! Those filthy cheaters keep making my beautiful droid lose!
A prize! One of those little Chevin knick-knacks, to anyone who ensures my droid gets the win it deserves!
Win, my droid! Win for Sapaaga!
A win! And those cheaters justly punished--magnificent!
Droid, give our new friend their deserved prize. Now, to feast upon my winnings!
